items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cozy, cute, true-to-size layering piece
items.body: I actually paid for this product and didn't receive it for free (though I'm certainly not opposed to being in the Vine program, Amazon!) and am still giving it five enthusiastic stars because I am so pleased. It's the perfect light yet cozy layering piece and I only wish it came in more colors. At 5' 8" and 155 lbs, I ordered a Medium and it fit exactly as I'd hoped. It drapes well, the arms are not overly tight, and it's a good length (not cropped and boxy but not so long that it looks like I'm an extra in The Matrix). After washing it on cool and drying on low, it didn't noticeably shrink and, if anything, became even softer. It seems well made, also. No loose threads or splitting seams. I've been wearing it as a layering piece to and from the gym and feel like it elevates my regular athletic gear. If it came in charcoal gray or olive, I'd be buying those in a heartbeat. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight perfect!
items.body: Love it..need another one! Read more
items.author: HMcD

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Feels nice, is a bit unflattering and clingy
items.body: This is a nice pink blush color and the fabric is soft and warm. It hangs kinda weird because it's a bit long and frumpy and the fabric has a tendency to stick to your other clothes but it's a good price and is nice for lounge wear or a cold office. Read more
items.author: KatDoh85

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but NOT a true white
items.body: This is soft and fits cute and if it were a true, pure white I would have kept it. But it’s going back to Amazon. It’s essentially very thin sweatshirt material and very comfy, but you can see the gray running thru it! So when it’s on, it has a muted grayish/beige-ish look. I already have an ivory cardigan, I needed one that was WHITE. This ain’t it. I’m 5’4, 130 lbs, and got the small. Read more
items.author: Lit Fanatic

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable, light, runs big
items.body: This is a nice, light sweater to add an extra layer of warmth without being too hot. It's thin and has a bit of a stretch to it so it's not too constricting, and it softens up when you wash it so it's very comfortable. It lays nicely and is not bulky. I wear it over tees or pajamas for an extra layer. It runs big. I normally wear a women's medium in shirts, and I ordered a small in this, and it fits perfectly - not tight, but not too roomy. It does run long, but it's long enough that I can tie the bottom edges up in a small knot if I don't want it to hang down. It also has small pockets. Overall I really like this sweater for an extra layer to wear around the house, and it's nice and basic enough that I could wear it out too if I wanted. My only complaint is that it's a bit longer than I'd like - I'm 5'4" and it hangs down past my hips (to about mid-thigh) - and there isn't a way to shorten it or fasten the long sides of it together without tying it in a knot. I have another similar sweater that has inside flaps so that one side can fit into the other, making it like a wrap, and I prefer that, but overall this is a nice sweater that does it's job. Read more
items.author: Petra Craddock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
items.body: I get very hot very easily. I have tattoos on my arm that I like to cover while at work. I also work with sex offenders and need something that hides the shape of my body well (e.g. modest). During the hotter months, when I don’t have a 3/4 quarter length shirt to wear or a tunic, I need something light to cover up with. This has been the *perfect* solution. I like mine very loose and long, so I got the largest size even though realistically I could fit in a small or medium. Despite this, it looks fine because it had a nice flowy look to it (though I will say the sleeves are a bit long due to buying a bigger size). I first bought the black/grey one and then the heathered white one. They are as cool (temperature wise) as you can get, aside from linen-style kimonos/cardigans! It’s 100% cotton, very soft/cozy, and SUPER thin. It has pockets that are functional. I only paid $23 and I find that to be reasonable. I think some shoppers will dislike how thin this is and I could see how some might see it as “robe like,” but if you are wearing it with the right outfit that shouldn’t be the case. Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: Quality is. price is good. True to size. Read more
items.author: Jacci

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, lightweight, and casual
items.body: I got the striped gray and white one, It was cute and lightweight, however it was large (I usually wear L and M was almost too big). I returned it because it looked a bit like pajama top on me. Read more
items.author: frenchmommyof2

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Grey Heather Stripe, Lavender, Beige Zebra Stripe, Light Grey Heather, Black, Light Pink, Light Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
